content.raw:
One downside, it does make import errors a bit noisier in Python 2 (1 extra traceback line per import) if a module successfully is found, but has an error upon being imported.

I added code that makes this less noisy for Python 3, but there is not much that can be done in Python 2, and it's not so bad.
content.html:
One downside, it does make import errors a bit noisier in Python 2 (1 extra traceback line per import) if a module successfully is found, but has an error upon being imported.

I added code that makes this less noisy for Python 3, but there is not much that can be done in Python 2, and it's not so bad.
